name: Dolo 650
description: Dolo 650 Tablet is a common painkiller used to treat aches and pains. It works by blocking chemical messengers in the brain that tell us we have pain. It is effective in relieving pain caused by headache, migraine, nerve pain, toothache, sore throat, period (menstrual) pains, arthritis, and muscle aches.

name: Crocin Advance
description: Crocin Advance Tablet is used to temporarily relieve fever and mild to moderate pain such as muscle ache, headache, toothache, arthritis, and backache.

name: Augmentin 625 Duo
description: Augmentin 625 Duo Tablet is an antibiotic agent that fights bacteria. It is used to treat infections of the lungs (e.g., pneumonia), ear, nasal sinus, urinary tract, skin, and soft tissue.

name: Allegra 120mg
description: Allegra 120mg Tablet is an anti-allergy medicine used in the treatment of allergic symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, congestion or stuffy nose, red, watery, and itchy eyes, and itchy skin.

name: Pantocid 40
description: Pantocid 40 Tablet is a medicine that reduces the amount of acid produced in your stomach. It is used for treating acid-related diseases of the stomach and intestine such as heartburn, acid reflux, and peptic ulcer disease.

name: Ascoril LS Syrup
description: Ascoril LS Syrup is a combination medicine used in the treatment of cough with mucus. It thins mucus in the nose, windpipe, and lungs, making it easier to cough out.

name: Combiflam
description: Combiflam Tablet contains two medicines: Ibuprofen and Paracetamol. These work together to relieve pain, fever, and inflammation.

name: Montair LC
description: Montair LC Tablet is a combination medicine used in the treatment of allergic symptoms such as runny nose, stuffy nose, sneezing, itching, swelling, watery eyes and congestion or stuffiness.

name: Azithral 500
description: Azithral 500 Tablet is an antibiotic used to treat various types of bacterial infections of the respiratory tract, ear, nose, throat, lungs, skin, and eye in adults and children.

name: Volini Gel
dosage: Apply to affected area 3-4 times daily
description: Volini Gel is a pain relief gel that provides fast and effective relief from muscle pain, neck and back pain, inflammation, sprain, myositis, fibrositis and sciatica.
